newsitem.title: USA: W.House aide says Clinton ecstatic on budget.
newsitem.headline: W.House aide says Clinton ecstatic on budget.

text.p: President Clinton was "ecstatic" to hear of a budget agreement reached with congressional Republican leaders, White House legislative director John Hilley told reporters Thursday.
"He's ecstatic," Hilley said when asked the president's reaction to the successful conclusion of talks to wrap up details on the five-year balanced budget plan.
"This is a very good day for both parties and for America," Hilley added.
A spokesman for House Democratic Leader Dick Gephardt of Missouri said they were anxious to see the final details.
